Posts.EditableText:
I think I know the answer but...

If I update my first Xanadu game, will anyone who has saved online be unable to resume a saved game from the original?

Thanks!
Posts.HTML:
I think I know the answer but...

If I update my first Xanadu game, will anyone who has saved online be unable to resume a saved game from the original?

Thanks!

Posts.EditableText: As I understand it, when you save the whole game is saved, so the game is frozen in that version. Your players should be fine, they will still be playing the original.
Posts.HTML: As I understand it, when you save the whole game is saved, so the game is frozen in that version. Your players should be fine, they will still be playing the original.
